name: INMediaSortOrder
desc: Constants indicating the sort order for the found media items.

items.name: case newest
items.desc: The app sorts the media items from newest to oldest.

items.name: case oldest
items.desc: The app sorts the media items from oldest to newest.

items.name: case best
items.desc: The app sorts the media items from best to worst.

items.name: case worst
items.desc: The app sorts the media items from worst to best.

items.name: case popular
items.desc: The app sorts the media items from the most to least popular.

items.name: case unpopular
items.desc: The app sorts the media items from the least to most popular.

items.name: case trending
items.desc: The app sorts the media items with those trending the most first.

items.name: case recommended
items.desc: The app sorts the media items with those it recommends first.
